artist: Artist: Gilbert & George (Gilbert Prousch & George Passmore); Publisher: Enitharmon Press, London
description: dark blue slip cover case with white label in center reading 'THE WORLD OF GILBERT AND GEORGE'; dark blue hardcover book inside; 'THE WORLD OF GILBERT AND GEORGE' spelled out in gold lettering; interior has text and line drawings; lender's archive #223
life_date: British, born  Italy 1943 & British, born 1942, resp.
markings: Numbered in black ink on colophon page: 138/150
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed and inscribed in red marker on inside cover: lots of love from │ Gilbert and George
title: The World of Gilbert and George: The Storyboard
